Name: GitHub - Tag Release
Description: Tag a GitHub repository with a label.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
# Copyright (c) Microsoft. All rights reserved.

$username = $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Username']
$email = $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Email']
$repositoryUrl = "https://" + $username + ":" + $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Password'] + "@github.com/" + $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Organization'] + "/" + $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Repository'] + ".git"
$label = $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Label']
$targetEnvironment = $OctopusParameters['Octopus.Environment.Name']
$commitMessage = "Deployed version $label to $targetEnvironment"
$checkoutDirectory = "$env:temp" + $OctopusParameters['Octopus.Environment.Name'] + "\\" + $label
$workingDirectory = $checkoutDirectory + "\\" + $OctopusParameters['GitHub.Repository']

Write-Host "Creating directory $checkoutDirectory"
md $checkoutDirectory
cd $checkoutDirectory

Write-Host ("git clone {0} --branch {1} --single-branch --quiet" -f $repositoryUrl, $OctopusParameters['GitHub.BranchName'])
git clone $repositoryUrl --branch $OctopusParameters['GitHub.BranchName'] --single-branch --quiet | Out-Null

cd $workingDirectory

git config user.name '$username' | Out-Null
git config user.email '$email' | Out-Null

Write-Host ("git tag -a {0} -m '{1}'" -f $label, $commitMessage)
git tag -a $label -m $commitMessage | Out-Null

Write-Host ("git push origin {0} -quiet" -f $label)
git push origin $label --quiet | Out-Null

cd $env:SystemDrive
Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $checkoutDirectory
Write-Host "Removed directory $checkoutDirectory"

Parameters.Name: GitHub.Repository
Parameters.Label: GitHub Repository Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the GitHub repository (e.g. OctopusDeploy.Library).

Parameters.Name: GitHub.Username
Parameters.Label: GitHub Username
Parameters.HelpText: The GitHub username used to tag the repository.

Parameters.Name: GitHub.Password
Parameters.Label: GitHub Password
Parameters.HelpText: The GitHub password for the user that will tag the repository.

Parameters.Name: GitHub.Email
Parameters.Label: GitHub Email Address
Parameters.HelpText: The email address of the user tagging the GitHub repository.

Parameters.Name: GitHub.Label
Parameters.Label: GitHub Label
Parameters.HelpText: The label to tag the GitHub repository with.
